value.0:
DESCRIPTION:
a stone that comes in a varity of colors and shapes and often seen in jewellery of average quality, the star or blue garnet is a favorit in jewellery since its both harder then the other and more eyecatching.

LORE:
Garnets are believed to contain both protective and destructive elements. 
The star however is most known for its ability to attract the opposit sex and for this also used in many potions used among pleasure-gilrs.
some sages simply say garnets twist the imaginations of the owner
